by_var.var_def: Daily mean concentration of nitrogen dioxide (NO2) measured at monitoring stations within the geographic area
by_var.coding: Measured concentration values in micrograms per cubic meter

by_var.var_def: Daily mean concentration of ground-level ozone (O3) measured at monitoring stations within the geographic area
by_var.coding: Measured concentration values in micrograms per cubic meter

by_var.var_def: Daily mean concentration of particulate matter with diameter ≤10 micrometers (PM10) measured at monitoring stations within the geographic area
by_var.coding: Measured concentration values in micrograms per cubic meter

by_var.var_def: Daily mean concentration of fine particulate matter with diameter ≤2.5 micrometers (PM2.5) measured at monitoring stations within the geographic area
by_var.coding: Measured concentration values in micrograms per cubic meter
